issue.title: [Python] Enhance benchmark suite
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2092](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2092). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to test more operations in the ASV-based benchmarks suite.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2092?focusedCommentId=16589345) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I'm gonna close this in favour of more focussed issues when necessary.
